name: "All My Children"--2008 Part 2 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the abused woman that Frankie Hubbard treated in the ER?
questions.explanation:
Randi.

	Dr. Frankie Hubbard met Randi when he treated her for several suspicious injuries when she was brought into the emergency room.  Randi was hiding a secret, but it was discovered that she was a prostitute and had been beaten several times by her pimp.

questions.text: Who did Aidan rescue from the kidnapping situation in Africa?
questions.explanation:
Jake Martin.

	Jake has been doing AIDS research in Africa for many years.  He was kidnapped by a group of terrorists and held for ransom.  Zack sent Aidan in on a rescue mission.  Jake reluctantly decided to stay in Pine Valley for awhile with the help of Dixie's ghost.

questions.text: Who was responsible for letting it slip about the affair between Aidan and Kendall to Greenlee?
questions.explanation:
Jack.

	At Angie and Jesse's wedding reception Jack accidentally let the cat out of the bag to Greenlee because he thought that she had already figured out about the affair.  Greenlee immediately broke off her engagement with Aidan and her relationship with Kendall was left teetering on the rocks.

questions.text: Which of the following characters was NOT shot by Robert Gardner at Angie and Jesse's wedding reception?
questions.explanation:
Opal.

	Tad and Greg both were wounded by Robert Gardner.  Julia's injuries were so bad that she did not survive.  Opal was only kidnapped and drugged by Robert and placed in a linen closet.  After Robert's rampage he was arrested by police officers, never to be heard from again.

questions.text: Whom did Dixie come back from the grave to haunt?
questions.explanation:
Adam.

	Dixie came back to try and coerce Adam to tell Tad that Kathy was really Kate their long lost daughter.  He refused for several weeks so Dixie played several dirty tricks on him and it made people think he was going insane.  Eventually Adam came to his senses and told Tad the truth, finally making it known that they had found Kate.

questions.text: Who helped Babe get dressed up like a hooker to investigate Richie's wrong doings?
questions.explanation:
Amanda.

	Babe had the crazy idea of going undercover to get information about Richie from the hooker that was caught in bed with JR.  Things went terribly wrong and JR came to the rescue.  They were able to convince Trina to turn evidence against Richie for his role in kidnapping JR to steal his bone marrow.

questions.text: Why was Richie blackmailing Annie into giving him money?
questions.correct: He found out that Ryan had never really had a vasectomy
options: He found out that Emma was really not Ryan's child
He found out that Ryan was faking his amnesia
He found out that Annie had threatened to kill Greenlee
questions.explanation:
He found out that Ryan had never really had a vasectomy.

	Richie found out that Ryan had never actually had a vasectomy, but that Annie wasn't going to tell him that.  The only way that he would keep the secret was if she gave him money.  He needed the money to give to Trina so she wouldn't tell anyone about kidnapping JR.

questions.text: From the start, Angie was very encouraging towards Jesse in his desire to the Pine Valley Police Chief.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Angie absolutely did not want Jesse to go back into law enforcement.  She couldn't live with the fact that something else might happen to him and she didn't think she could survive losing him again.

questions.text: What color did Kathy want to paint her new room at Tad and Crystal's house?
questions.explanation:
Pink.

	Kathy moved in with Tad and Crystal right after they learned that she was really Kate.  Tad told her that once he got better he would paint her room any color she wanted.  She told him that pink was her favorite color.  Colby surprised Kathy with a doll house that she used to play with for her newly decorated room.

questions.text: By the end of June of 2008 (in American airdates), Greenlee and Aidan had completely reconciled their relationship.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Greenlee tried to be just friends with Aidan, but she realized she still had strong feelings for him and it wouldn't work out.  She decided to ask Jake to be her roommate to get her mind off of Aidan.  Thanks for playing my quiz!  Let me know if you liked it!
